content: Bi-Metal Hole Saws Premium Bi-Metal Hole Saws for cutting wood, steel, sheet metal, and plastics (arbor sold separately) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile - cut holes in most everyday construction materials using the same hole saw. Knock-out holes for easier core removal. Premium quality Bi-Metal Construction. Made in America 1-15/16 cutting depth Applications Cutting holes for MEP installations in plasterboard, wood, plastic, steel and aluminum. Cutting holes for cable/pipe penetrations. Cutting holes in plasterboard for sprinkler heads. Cutting holes for power outlets and electrical fixtures. Hole Saws must be used with a compatible arbor and pilot bit. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal, Wood with nails, Wood, Steel, Plastic Working mode: Drilling Connection end: n/a Technical Data | Base material | Metal, Wood with nails, Wood, Steel, Plastic | Working mode | Drilling | Connection end | n/a ### ITEMS- 3785282 -
